application_information.about_this_app: # Arith Arith is a simple ratio and proportion calculator app designed for performing calculations. It offers basic features like ratio and proportion calculations. ## Key Features: - **Ratio Calculation**: Perform ratio calculations. - **Proportion Calculation**: Perform proportion calculations. For more information or support, visit the [Arith Help Center](https://help.arith.io/) or contact Arith support at [support@arith.io](mailto:support@arith.io)
application_information.Required_Os: Android 6.0> or iOS 12.0> or Web Browser
application_information.interactive_elements: Users interact, Shares location, Digital purchases
